short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our engine constantly compares your 'Price I Want to Pay' (PIWoP) with the item's current price. Notification when price as desired.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can now create a price alert for this with one click of our Panda button. Our engine constantly compares your 'Price I Want to Pay' (PIWoP) with the item's current price. When the price drops to or below your PIWoP we notify you.
